text: Ndava yeniyo Kilisitu ndi mtepulanisi mwealetili lilaganu la mupya muni vala vevakemeliwi na Chapanga vihotola kupokela lilaganu la magono goha gangali mwishu levahaidiwi. Lenili lihotoleka ndava mu njila ya kufwa kwaki avagombwili vandu kuhuma muuhakau wavi wevahengili mu lukumbi lwa lilaganu la kadeni.
